ship.name: Amigo Pirates' Submarine
ship.description: A green submarine with intricate pattern designs, featuring paddle-wheels for underwater movement, and a saloon-like interior with round tables.

goals: Join Shiki's fleet as the 51st division
Capture Boss the beetle to prove themselves to Shiki

keyMoments.title: Largo Reveals Devil Fruit Powers
keyMoments.description: Captain Largo demonstrates the Ami Ami no Mi, showcasing the crew's combat capabilities through his net-creation abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Amigo Pirates as a formidable threat with unique Devil Fruit powers.

keyMoments.title: Successful Capture of Zoro and Sanji
keyMoments.description: The Amigo Pirates successfully trap two of the Straw Hats' strongest fighters, demonstrating their effectiveness as a capture-specialized crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's competence in their specialty of trapping and capturing targets.

alliances.description: Attempted to join Shiki's fleet but failed after losing to the Straw Hats

conflicts.description: Fought the Straw Hat Pirates over Boss the beetle at Little East Blue

statusHistory.reason: Defeated by the Straw Hat Pirates and imprisoned by Little East Blue villagers

theme: Mexican mariachi-style pirate crew specializing in creature capture and trapping
